ai-patthana23.23:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.23:1.1_0: Not corruption, nor is a cause of corruption.
ai-patthana23.23:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.23:3.1_0: Not corruption, nor does Dhamma arise in someone whose mind isn’t corrupted, or whose thoughts are defiled.
